con:testCase.name: No warning rule hit FOUND if wildcard search FAILS on Account
con:testCase.con:description: Domestic Currency Payment Normal Priority w/o exchange Out

con:request.name: PaymentCreate
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wsc="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v22" xmlns:urn="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:ws:paymentinitiation:v2_0" xmlns:urn1="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:paymentinitiation:v2_0" xmlns:urn2="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:complex-types:v2_0" xmlns:urn3="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:debtor:v2_0" xmlns:urn4="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:creditor:v2_0"> <soapenv:Header> <wsc:AutHeader> <wsc:SourceApplication>${Properties#SourceApplication}</wsc:SourceApplication> <wsc:DestinationApplication>${Properties#Destnation}</wsc:DestinationApplication> <wsc:Function>paymentAuthorizationCreate</wsc:Function> <wsc:Version>V2.0</wsc:Version> <wsc:ClientContext> <wsc:userid>${Properties#userid}</wsc:userid> <wsc:credentials>${Properties#Credentials}</wsc:credentials> <wsc:channel>${Properties#Channel}</wsc:channel> <wsc:orgid>${Properties#Orgid}</wsc:orgid> <wsc:orgunit>${Properties#Orgid}</wsc:orgunit> <wsc:customerid>${Properties#customerid}</wsc:customerid> <wsc:locale>en</wsc:locale> <wsc:ip>1.1.1.1</wsc:ip> <wsc:item value="${Properties#value1}" key="${Properties#item1}"/> <wsc:item value="${Properties#value2}" key="${Properties#item2}"/> <wsc:item value="${Properties#value4}" key="${Properties#item4}"/> <wsc:item value="${Properties#value3}" key="${Properties#item3}"/> </wsc:ClientContext> </wsc:AutHeader> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <urn:PaymentCreateRequest> <urn:paymentMessage> <urn1:paymentIdentification> <urn2:messageIdentification>${=Math.abs(new Random().nextInt() % 6000000) + 1}</urn2:messageIdentification> <urn2:endToEndIdentification>${=Math.abs(new Random().nextInt() % 6000000)+1}</urn2:endToEndIdentification> <!--Optional:--> </urn1:paymentIdentification> <urn1:paymentInfo> <urn3:paymentMethod>TRF</urn3:paymentMethod> <!--Optional:--> <urn3:paymentTypeInformation> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <urn3:instructionPriority>NORM</urn3:instructionPriority></urn3:paymentTypeInformation> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level--> <urn3:requestedExecutionDate>${#TestSuite#ReqExnDate}</urn3:requestedExecutionDate> <urn3:debtorAccount> <urn2:identification>${Properties#debitAccount}</urn2:identification> <urn2:currency>${#TestSuite#debitAcntccy}</urn2:currency> <!--Optional:--> </urn3:debtorAccount> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> </urn1:paymentInfo> <urn1:transaction> <urn4:amount> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level--> <urn2:instructedAmount currency="NOK"> <urn2:amount>5</urn2:amount> </urn2:instructedAmount> </urn4:amount> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <urn4:chargeBearer>CRED</urn4:chargeBearer> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:-->
<urn4:creditor> <urn2:name>CreditorDom</urn2:name> <urn2:postalAddress> <urn2:addressType>ADDR</urn2:addressType> <urn2:department>credi</urn2:department> <urn2:subDepartment>SPAREBANKEN VEST</urn2:subDepartment> <urn2:streetName>Ale</urn2:streetName> <urn2:buildingNumber>76</urn2:buildingNumber> <urn2:postCode>6003</urn2:postCode> <urn2:townName>Ã…lesund</urn2:townName> <urn2:countrySubDivision>Bergen</urn2:countrySubDivision> <urn2:country>NO</urn2:country> <urn2:addressLine>JERNBANEGATA 15</urn2:addressLine> <urn2:addressLine>POB 68</urn2:addressLine> <urn2:addressLine>8656</urn2:addressLine> <urn2:addressLine>Bergen</urn2:addressLine> <urn2:addressLine>NORWAY</urn2:addressLine> </urn2:postalAddress> <urn2:emailAddress>abc@evry.com</urn2:emailAddress> <urn2:contactDetailsName>Creditor</urn2:contactDetailsName> </urn4:creditor> <urn4:creditorAccount> <urn2:identification>${Properties#CreditAccount}</urn2:identification>
<!--Optional:--> </urn4:creditorAccount><urn1:remittanceInformationUnstructured>Nowarningrule12</urn1:remittanceInformationUnstructured> <!--Optional:--> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> </urn1:transaction> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> </urn:paymentMessage> </urn:PaymentCreateRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"/> </ns3:ResponseState> <ns2:paymentResult> <ns4:messageId>1020236</ns4:messageId> <ns4:paymentInfoId>1113678</ns4:paymentInfoId> currency="NOK"> <ns5:amount>2.30</ns5:amount> </ns4:transactionFee> <ns4:paymentIdentification> <ns5:messageIdentification>4322073</ns5:messageIdentification> <ns5:endToEndIdentification>1293199</ns5:endToEndIdentification> </ns4:paymentIdentification> <ns4:groupHeader> <ns5:creationDateTime>2021-10-04T16:21:01.135+02:00</ns5:creationDateTime> <ns5:postalAddress> <ns5:country>NO</ns5:country> </ns5:postalAddress> </ns7:creditorAgent> <ns7:creditor> <ns5:name>CreditorDom</ns5:name> <ns5:postalAddress> <ns5:addressType>ADDR</ns5:addressType> con:request.name: PaymentConfirm
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wsc="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v21" xmlns:urn="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:ws:paymentstatusupdate:v1_4" xmlns:urn1="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:payment-status-update:v1_4"> <soapenv:Header> <wsc:AutHeader> <wsc:SourceApplication>${Properties#SourceApplication}</wsc:SourceApplication> <wsc:DestinationApplication>${Properties#Destnation}</wsc:DestinationApplication> <wsc:Function>paymentAuthorizationCreate</wsc:Function> <wsc:Version>V2.0</wsc:Version> <wsc:ClientContext> <wsc:userid>${Properties#userid}</wsc:userid> <wsc:credentials>${Properties#Credentials}</wsc:credentials> <wsc:channel>${Properties#Channel}</wsc:channel> <wsc:orgid>${Properties#Orgid}</wsc:orgid> <wsc:orgunit>${Properties#Orgid}</wsc:orgunit> <wsc:customerid>${Properties#customerid}</wsc:customerid> <wsc:locale>en</wsc:locale> <wsc:ip>1.1.1.1</wsc:ip> <wsc:item value="${Properties#value1}" key="${Properties#item1}"/> <wsc:item value="${Properties#value2}" key="${Properties#item2}"/> <wsc:item value="${Properties#value4}" key="${Properties#item4}"/> <wsc:item value="${Properties#value3}" key="${Properties#item3}"/> </wsc:ClientContext> </wsc:AutHeader> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <urn:PaymentConfirmRequest> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 4 items at this level--> <urn:transactionInput> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <urn1:transactionId>${PaymentCreate#Response#declare namespace ns4='urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:paymentinitiation:v2_0'; declare namespace ns2='urn:pins.payment.evry.com:ws:paymentinitiation:v2_0'; //ns2:PaymentCreateResponse[1]/ns2:paymentResult[1]/ns4:transactionId[1]}</urn1:transactionId> </urn:transactionInput> </urn:PaymentConfirmRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:config.con:query: select TRANSACTIONSID,PAYMENTTYPE,PAYMENTSTATUS,WB_FLAG from TRANSACTIONS where transactionsid = '${PaymentCreate#Response#declare namespace ns4='urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:paymentinitiation:v2_0'; declare namespace ns2='urn:pins.payment.evry.com:ws:paymentinitiation:v2_0'; //ns2:PaymentCreateResponse[1]/ns2:paymentResult[1]/ns4:transactionId[1]}'

con:elements.con:xpath: //Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/@fetchSize
//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/@rowNumber
//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/TRANSACTIONSID[1]
//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/PAYMENTTYPE[1]
//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/PAYMENTSTATUS[1]
//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/WB_FLAG[1]

con:config.con:query: select *From WB_HIT where FK_TRANSACTIONSID= '${PaymentCreate#Response#declare namespace ns4='urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:paymentinitiation:v2_0'; declare namespace ns2='urn:pins.payment.evry.com:ws:paymentinitiation:v2_0'; //ns2:PaymentCreateResponse[1]/ns2:paymentResult[1]/ns4:transactionId[1]}'

con:elements.con:xpath: //Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/@fetchSize
